column5: I hope everyone is being safe out there. My thermometer by the office hit 95 in the shade today. Remember to pack your swim trunks and jump in to cool the core down!

When your out in a aluminum boat in the the 90's on the water with a few biting flies its deadly. took a lot of years to figure out to take some sun screen. Better yet just go back to the cabin and and have a cocktail and take a sweltering nap and get ready for the evening fishing. YUK YUK...... The stupid old Camp Cook......Halfmoon
